revised_title: Mycetozoa Conjugation and Alternating Currents Research
tldr: This article discusses the research conducted on Mycetozoa conjugation, which is similar to the division of micro-nucleus in Infusoria and nuclei division in higher forms of animals and plants. Additionally, it presents findings on an apparatus for measuring self-induction coefficients and investigating alternating currents phenomena, as well as a preliminary note on a method for harmonic analysis of alternating currents.
